title: Heikousen

title: Kuiba Zhi Shu Tu
synopsis: The story takes place in Lingshan, where a group of "hopeless" people are gathered on the earth. Most of them are poor, vicious, or extremely evil, abandoned by the society in Lingshan. This is where the fourth generation of Kuiba Mi Lin was born.  The Heavens struggled to find Kuiba to no avail. In order to eliminate Kuiba, the Heavens determined to blast Lingshan into the ground. Mi Lin rose from the predicament, and his spirit gradually awakened souls with flesh and blood in Lingshan. Mi Lin led the Lingshan Army to sweep across the world, against the Heavens, and became the overlord of the world. (Source: Tencent, translated)
background: Adapted from Qing Qing Shu's (青青树) novel titled Kuiba Zhi Shu (魁拔之书).

title: Killing Stalking
synopsis: Yoon Bum is a broken, beaten, and scarred human being, whose mental instability and loneliness have led him to unhealthy outlets for his pent up emotions. With his weakened mind, Bum has found solace in watching his handsome classmate Oh Sangwoo; Bum's love runs so deep, in fact, that he has begun stalking him. While creeping in Sangwoo's house one day, Bum makes a horrifying discovery—a torture chamber and a naked young woman tied up, gagged, and pleading for help. The life of this woman is doomed, and Bum cannot escape either, as he is soon discovered. His eyes sickening and crazed, Sangwoo takes Bum as his newest pet and victim. What awaits the mentally tortured Bum is a world of physical mutilation, toxic dependence, and abuse masquerading as so-called love.
background: Killing Stalking won the Grand Prize in Lezhin's 2nd World Comic Contest. The series was published digitally in English and Japanese by Lezhin Comics from November 24, 2016 and January 16, 2017, respectively, to March 22, 2019. It was also published in Italian by Edizioni BD under the J-Pop imprint from July 12, 2017 to June 12, 2019.

title: Xin Chenglong Lixian Ji Zhi Mengjing Shouhu Zhe
synopsis: Every child enters the same dream world when dreaming. It is a fantasy land of childlike projections of the real world. Only dream guardians can freely shuttle between the two worlds. Children who wake up from the dream will remember the experience in the dream, but will forget the existence of the guardian of the dream. In order to grab energy from children's nightmares and complete the space tunnel to the real world, Professor Luan Lai, who was trapped in the dream world, produced various capsule monsters, turning children's dreams into nightmares. In each episode, J-TEAM fights wits and courage with the monster created by the professor, finally defeats the monster and returns the dream to the child. The children learned the solution to their troubles from the nightmare adventure and grew up happily and healthy.  (TRANSLATED FROM QQ)

details.Japanese: 新成龙历险记之梦境守护者

title: Xin Chenglong Lixian Ji Zhi Mengjing Shouhu Zhe
synopsis: Every child enters the same dream world when dreaming. It is a fantasy land of childlike projections of the real world. Only dream guardians can freely shuttle between the two worlds. Children who wake up from the dream will remember the experience in the dream, but will forget the existence of the guardian of the dream. title: Feng Sheng Shui Qi Zhi 24 Jieqi De Gushi
synopsis: After experiencing the different life feelings brought by 24 solar terms in a year, Jie Jie Chong has completed the life cycle of life from ignorance to maturity, from birth to death to transformation. In this process, the big tail fish helped him expand his knowledge, and the lucky bird helped him to improve his horizons, so that the arthropods from the soil had a lofty spiritual realm and life pursuit, and met the challenges of transcending themselves.  (translated from bilibili)

details.Japanese: 风生水起之24节气的故事

title: Gon De Hanta
synopsis: Interpreting the funny daily life of a marmot in the form of black humor, a very lazy marmot, who is in the late stage of procrastination, wants to lose weight and loves to drink Coke. I believe that 99% of people are as entangled as marmots and let themselves live. Come on Shake with the marmot.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Gon De Hanta season2
synopsis: "Gon's Marmot" shows the funny daily life of a marmot in the form of black humorous paragraphs. He is fat and lazy, and will suddenly accelerate. It is in the late stage of procrastination and often has flashes of inspiration. He wants to lose weight and loves to drink Coke, loves fantasy and reality. A complex of contradictions, like 99.9% of contemporary young people, living happily and entangledly. Come and shake up with the marmot, relax and heal your every day while funny ghosts and animals.  (translated from bilibili)

title: Akumajō Dracula
synopsis: When his wife is burned at the stake after being falsely accused of witchcraft, the vampire Count Dracula declares all the people of Wallachia will pay with their lives. He summons an army of demons which overruns the country, causing the people to live lives of fear and distrust. To combat this, the outcast monster hunter Trevor Belmont takes up arms against Dracula's forces, aided by the magician Sypha Belnades and Dracula's dhampir son Alucard. site; wikipedia.
background:
written by warren ellis, produced by project 51 and netflix, animated by powerhouse animation, The review aggregation website Rotten Tomatoes reported that 80% of critics have given the first season a positive review based on 25 reviews, with an average rating of 7.39/10. The site's critics consensus reads, "Castlevania offers spectacular visuals and a compelling adaptation in its all-too-short first season."[32] It is the first video game adaptation in the site's history to receive a "Fresh" rating.[33] Metacritic, which assigns a rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream critics, reported that there were "generally favorable reviews" for the first season, with an weighted average score of 71 based on 5 reviews.[34]

The Verge gave a mixed review, noting that the gore did little to create a sense of danger and felt "intentionally flashy". It concluded that "Castlevania is ripe with potential, but also burdened with cliches."[35] Dave Trumbore of Collider gave the series four stars out of five, praising the chemistry between the cast and comparing the violence with anime such as Ninja Scroll.[36] IGN also wrote glowingly of Warren Ellis's script, but felt some of his humor was a little jarring.[37] In a review for Paste Magazine, Dave Raposo wrote that Castlevania channeled the cutaway gag formula that is seen in Family Guy. He dismissed the "absurd" attempts at humanizing Dracula and called it a "milquetoast imitation of Game of Thrones", noting that the ambitions of the script "fly in the face of the simple ideals that unify the best entries in the Castlevania series".[38] Several reviews lauded the voice cast, particularly Graham McTavish as Dracula and Richard Armitage as Trevor Belmont.[37] Screen Rant's Sarah Moran drew attention to the "sarcastic edge" that Armitage brought to the character, and also noted Callis's "air of sophistication" as Alucard.[39] Destructoid also wrote positively of Trevor Belmont as a protagonist, but criticized the animation and added that the character designs were "flat".[40] Dan Seitz at Uproxx left a negative review, writing that it tried too hard to find profundity in the story of the Castlevania series. He also cited issues with the pacing.[41]

Rotten Tomatoes reported that 100% of critics have given the second season a positive review with an average rating of 9.73/10, based on 12 reviews. The critics consensus reads, "Castlevania sinks its fangs into vampiric lore during a devilishly fun second season that benefits from an expanded sense of scale and episode tally that allows the series to fully spread its leathery wings."[42]

Complaints were made towards the pacing and the screen time spent on Dracula's court in season two. Writing for GameSpot, Michael Rougeau was disappointed that Trevor's group spent the majority of their time in a library, and also said Dracula "does literally nothing in all the episodes we've seen so far. There's one medium length flashback in which he massacres a council of merchants who offended him, but it's not like that moves the story along". Rougeau concluded that the action was creatively executed, but he felt that the new cast was given more development and that the previous characters were left to "tread water".[43] Film School Rejects echoed similar sentiments, who said the second season was more of a complement to the first one. McTavish and the rest of the voice cast were once again met with high praise.[44] In Collider's review for the second series, Dave Trumbore mentioned there "isn't a weak link in the cast here".[45] IGN gave the second season a 9.2/10, praising Ellis's approach to Castlevania as "witty and self-aware enough to poke fun at itself when necessary".[46]

title: Gon De Hanta season3
synopsis: "Gon's Marmot" uses black humor to interpret the funny and relaxed daily life of a marmot. This marmot has a very lazy personality. It is in the late stage of procrastination. He wants to lose weight and likes to drink Coke. This season is divided into five chapters, and there are more brand-new and transcendent happiness, which will resonate with you in all aspects, and shake with the marmot!  (translated from bilibili)

title: Ta Ta Turan Xiangdao
synopsis: "Gon's Marmot" is online again easily everyday! Dadu loves to drink Coke the most. He has a lazy personality, but he often has a flash of inspiration and sudden acceleration. I believe that everyone has a sudden self. In the incomparably real life, Otter's brain is wide open, and suddenly there are countless illusions, making every little daily thing more exciting! Lazy Marmot, you, lazy, shake happily with the Marmot!  (translated from bilibili)

title: Congming De Shunliu Zhi Teshu Renwu
synopsis: The play tells about the five-member special combat team of Shunliu, Shangyu, and Gaochao, and the five-member youth team headed by Jingan received an order: complete a special task. After the ten people arrived at the base, they were told that the scientific research department had developed a large-scale experiential simulation VR national defense education system. They sat on the VR seats and returned to the important historical moment to participate in it, and experienced the historical events of that moment from the perspective of modern people. After reviewing the military history, the ten people realized "Why the soldiers fight", and the quiet five-member youth team understood the mission of being a teenager!  (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 聪明的顺溜之特殊任务

title: Xiagu Zhong An Zu Qian Pian
synopsis: Such a thing happened in the Canyon of Kings! The murderous corpse under the moonlit night, the dark ghost in the woods, chasing the murderer for thousands of miles, the murderer is him! Who is the manipulator behind, what happened to the strange murders, and the invincible but justice-filled Canyon Crime Squad will uncover the mysteries one by one.  (translated from bilibili)

title: Xiagu Zhong An Zu
synopsis: Di Renjie, Li Yuanfang, Yang Jian, and Bian Que were entrusted by the female emperor to set up a canyon crime team to maintain the order of the Kings Canyon. However, the treacherous cases continued one after another, and Li Yuanfang and Yang Jian were even innocently attacked by the tyrant until they became unconscious. The truth seems unconcealed but it is confusing. Li Yuanfang and Yang Jian woke up safely, and the crime squad seemed to return to a stable routine. But the undercurrent in the canyon has never stopped, and the shady remains unclear. The enemy is dark, I know, how will Di Renjie lead everyone to break the situation?  (translated from bilibili)

title: Xiagu Zhong An Zu season4
synopsis: Di Renjie, Li Yuanfang, Yang Jian, and Bian Que were entrusted by the female emperor to set up a canyon crime team to maintain the order of the Kings Canyon. However, the treacherous cases continued one after another, and Li Yuanfang and Yang Jian were even innocently attacked by the tyrant until they became unconscious. The truth seems unconcealed but it is confusing. Li Yuanfang and Yang Jian woke up safely, and the crime squad seemed to return to a stable routine. But the undercurrent in the canyon has never stopped, and the shady remains unclear. The enemy is dark, I know, how will Di Renjie lead everyone to break the situation?  (translated from bilibili)

details.Japanese: 峡谷重案组 第四季

title: Wulongyuan Zhi Huobao Chuanqi
synopsis: The animation of "Legend of Living Treasures of Wulongyuan" revolves around the emergence of the magical power of "live treasures". The four masters and apprentices were entrusted by the nobles of Qinglin Hot Spring to search for the whereabouts of the living treasures. They came to Duanyun Mountain and met Ai Fei. Fei accidentally hit and accidentally found the main pole and five keys of Huobao. It turned out that the living treasure was broken down into five parts and scattered around. You need to find the five keys to open the seal, and finally you can get the living treasure. The four masters and apprentices discovered that living treasure has magical power. If it falls into the wrong hands, the consequences will be disastrous. They know that the responsibility is heavy and follow the clues to find the other two parts of the living treasure through the Iron Castle and Shenmu Village. At the same time, the evil forces headed by Lord Lin are also looking for live treasures. The four masters and disciples battled their wits and courageously. In the adventure journey of treasure hunting and salvation, they realized that confidence and happiness are the true power, showing the wisdom and courage of the East. the spirit of  ()translated from iqiyi

title: Wulongyuan Zhi Huobao Chuanqi
synopsis: The animation of "Legend of Living Treasures of Oolongyuan" is characterized by a kung fu comedy style. The four masters and apprentices who live in the Oolongyuan are the main characters. A Liang, A Huanbai Master Long Eyebrow and Fat Master learn Kung Fu. The four also depend on each other for their lives. The story revolves around the emergence of magical power of "living treasure".  (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 乌龙院之活宝传奇 第二季

title: Tiantian Chengzhang Ji
synopsis: An ordinary family of three who originally lived in a big city, because the child was afraid of going to school, decided to leave the noisy city, return to nature, and live in the countryside together...In rural life, the dilemma emerges endlessly, and the characters cried and laughed. Every day in the countryside, I socialize, play, and take risks with my friends, and raise small animals by myself. I gradually learn to do housework such as washing and cooking. Through these rural fun facts, every day from the sensitive and timid little girl before going to the countryside, she gradually grows into a cheerful, independent and confident child. At the same time, parents have a new understanding of family and education in the process of going to the countryside to raise children, and grow up with their children.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Tiantian Chengzhang Ji season2
synopsis: Still in that beautiful village, the story of the city girl goes on every day. In this season, every day has cute chickens, lambs and rabbits, and also met new friends. With the company of small animals and friends, I become more confident and cheerful every day. Every day, I also learned to take care of sick mothers, help small partners in difficulties, make rice dumplings and cook... Every new attempt is a precious experience in the growth of children. With the deepening of the plot, in each episode, every day is learning to be grateful, learn to cherish, and learn to take responsibility. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Tiantian Chengzhang Ji season3
synopsis: Join the busy farming season with friends every day, challenge late rice planting, touch snails, and feel the fun and sense of accomplishment of coexisting in harmony with nature. Broadband Internet brings new development opportunities to small villages, and also new fun for children. Helpless summer homework is still to be done, left-behind children Dongdong, "little encyclopedia" Wang De, "super warm boy" Xiaopang and "mathematics genius" Xiaomei, each partner has a different attitude towards homework, so that they do not go to school. Countless curiosity arose every day  ()translated from iqiyi

title: Tiantian Chengzhang Ji season4
synopsis: At the end of the summer vacation, Tian Tian and my friends fell in love with the new teacher. This teacher is very special and interesting. She knows how to make learning happier. She will also assign homework outside of textbooks based on the actual conditions in the countryside, so that children can learn about nature. This makes every day before school like to go to school. Learn with friends every day, continue to explore nature together, and solve various small problems in life together  (translated form iqiyi)

title: Bao Shou Lieren
synopsis: In the distant ancient times, there were four mysterious continents outside of human civilization. Here, people and the Explosive Beast Dragon Egg live in peace...Until one day, the Ice and Snow Tribe tried to use the power of the Dragon Egg to dominate the world and attracted three other tribes to fight together. In the end, four continents were hit hard and fell into a deep sleep... Thousands of years have passed in a flash. Zhang Tianhao is a descendant of the Tornado tribe. By coincidence, he met the Explosive Beast Dragon Egg left over from ancient times and got to know the descendants of other tribes. They are like-minded and work together to stop the conspiracy of Mu Fei, the inheritor of the Ice and Snow Tribe. The gorgeous and exciting adventure begins here!  (translated from youku)

title: Bawang Mianju
synopsis: Zhang Meng, an ordinary young man, was accosted by a beautiful senior sister because of his outstanding performance in the dojo. But what awaits him is not an affair, but a life and death crisis. A group of "mask monsters" lurking among human beings quietly surfaced.  (translated from bilibili)

title: Di Ling Qu Loulan Gucheng
synopsis: In the sixth year of Damin, Ding Weiyue, Yi Maori, Haidu night, the tide of the sky, the sun and the moon, and the sea, all nightly visions appeared. For a time, the city was densely cloudy, buildings collapsed, and millions of creatures were placed upside down. anxious. In order to save all beings in the sea capital, the three great families of fighting, Zhang, Han, and Cao, joined forces to find the mystery of the vision. They learned that there are great secrets hidden in them, and there is a danger of turbulent Chinese dragon veins. Zhang Tianqi, the elder of the Zhang family, is kind and simple, upholding the righteousness of the family, and found the secret history of Loulan. The two are intertwined and inextricably linked. In order to save hundreds of millions of lives from the fire and water, and solve the distress of China's overthrow, Tianqi led a small team to go through many hardships and finally arrived in Loulan. Loulan-a place of decline for thousands of years, there is a large tomb of Tianzi, the tomb is unpredictable, and the Apocalypse team died nine years ago. What is the connection between the Haidu Mancheng and the Loulan Tianzi Tomb? A story spanning a thousand years is slowly kicking off... (translated from qq)

title: Di Ling Qu season2 Nan Jiang Miwu
synopsis: The Huaxia dragon vein began in Kunlun, and finally returned to the ruins. According to legend, the ancient wizard Guiguzi built the Guigu faction to continue the eternal prosperity of China. It used the Dragon Calling Scripture as its unique knowledge, and taught disciples. Jianglong, Zhenlong, Yulong four major ranks, one step at a time. The princes and generals, the people of the Li people, have followed suit. At this point, the great battles in the land of Kyushu have risen like stars. 　　 For thousands of years, there have been few royal dragons, and future generations have been competing for ten percent...  (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 地靈曲第二季 南疆迷霧

title: Kan Ge Qiu
synopsis: "Watching a Ball" is a series of hilarious stories in which the protagonists are constantly struggling to realize their dreams. In this ball world, the protagonists with different personalities perform their own dreams every day. The joy, anger, sorrow and joy. Taking the ball game as the image and dream as the theme, it shows a positive and healthy life attitude, the moral quality of promoting truth, goodness and beauty, and the pursuit of value for dreams.  (translated from bilibili)

title: Tiaoyue Zhanshi
synopsis: Leap Changer is an animation released by Lingdong Creative. It tells about a jumping sport that has taken the world by storm. An ordinary teenager who dreams of becoming a professional player encounters a magical small robot-the Leapman. At the same time, the crisis is coming to the city. The jumping boys work together, but a bigger crisis is lurking. Can they unite and save their homes?  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Tiaoyue Zhanshi season2
synopsis: Xiao Yi, a teenager who dreams of becoming a jumping kid. By chance, I got acquainted with the Leap Changer-Fire Knight. In an incident against the villain's troublemaker, Xiao Yi fought side by side with the fire knight to resolve the urban crisis created by the troublemaker. After that, Xiaoyi started training with the goal of participating in the selection of professional jumpers, during which many things happened. In the end, they defeated the king of trouble by relying on unity, hard work, and brave friendship and successfully saved the city! (translated from bilibili)

title: Tiaoyue Zhanshi Fanwai Pian
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Xingyuan Xiao Bao
synopsis: "Xingyuan Little Treasure" tells that in 2026, on the "Hadi Star" robot planet in the vast galaxy, the planet will face unprecedented danger of destruction due to exhaustion of energy. Dr. Rhino discovered the cosmic energy "Dreamdora Spar" and sent Xingbao and his friends to the galaxy to collect it. "Mundola Crystal" contains enormous energy, which can fully alleviate the energy shortage crisis of Hardy's Star. Moreover, "Mundola Crystal" this mysterious cosmic substance also has other magical and powerful unknown powers! At this time, the villains coveting the "Dreamdora Spar" have taken action! During the fierce battle, Xingbao and their spacecraft crashed to the earth, and the battle for the spar was about to start! (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xingyuan Xiao Bao Shenyong V5 Dui
synopsis: This drama tells the story of the Hardy Stars, in order to protect the earth and protect the most important human friend in life, the V5 team actively invites Ying to return to the earth, and join hands with human friends again to fight against the thieves who steal civilization and complete the important task of protecting the earth’s civilization. . The villain thieves have stolen important civilizations. The disappearance of civilization will cause social production and human activities to fall into chaos, so it becomes urgent to retake civilization. Wei Ji and the V5 team retake civilization together! In the process of fighting against the villains, the human protagonist Wei Ji and the robot The protagonist, Xingbao, unites and cooperates, overcomes difficulties, corrects shortcomings and bad habits; and learns scientific knowledge to deal with civilization monsters and complete their own growth when fighting civilization theft. Finally, the V5 team and Wei Ji successfully protected the earth's civilization. (translated form iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 星原小宝 第2季 神勇V5队

title: Xunbao Ji
synopsis: The story of vegetable elves and locust monsters in search of treasure  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ai Jingling Le Ji Er
synopsis: The Tammy Witch of the Academy of Magic asks Le Jier to take the angel of love to the earth to complete the task of collecting the energy of love, so Le Jier stumbles to the earth with the angel of love and the magic box. The Demon Queen also awakened from the seal, which had a huge impact on the earth and the Magic Academy! In order to save her friends, Le Jier decided to sacrifice herself, but she did not expect that this would instead collect all kinds of love. Family, friendship, love, and the magic box was filled with love, emitting powerful love energy. Finally defeated the demon queen.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Shan Buzai Gao
synopsis: In the ancient East, there was a "non-mountain", and there were many spiritual animals on the mountain, among which was a mysterious tiger. These animals are all strange and strange, causing a lot of trouble to the villagers down the mountain. The two masters and apprentices, known as "The First Catcher in the World," came to the village. While solving problems for the villagers, they wanted to catch the mysterious tiger. In this way, scenes of hilarious stories were staged.  (translated from baidu baike)

title: Ji Jia Dashi
synopsis: The beginning of the university's new semester. Without distracting thoughts, I only thought about how to improve the KAKA drone I made. It seemed a little out of place in the crowd of newcomers in the lively clubs. When the flying saucer was thrown out from the square at the back of the school building to the stretch of the coast for a drone KAKA capture test, the flying saucer accidentally flew onto a girl due to the influence of the sea breeze. This sudden accident turned into an opportunity to gradually grow the somewhat autistic one. (translated frmo qq)

title: Dou Long Zhanshi Zhi Bao She Long Dan
synopsis: In the world of fighting dragons, dragon spears and dragon bullets suddenly appeared, and the originally peaceful world of fighting dragons became interesting. The baby dragon Adi, Pipilong and their friends have launched a series of fantastic and interesting stories around the magic dragon gun and dragon bullet! Starting from the treasure hunt in Alibaba, to wisely teasing the evil dragon, and then encountering a series of interesting plots such as the ugly dragon and the little red riding hood, the two old enemies, Adi and Pipilong, have made many hilarious jokes. Let's start a brand new wonderful trip with the fighting dragon babies!  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Qiang Niang!FIRE
synopsis: "The Gun Lady" mainly tells the story of the protagonist Kerry, who has lost his memory of fighting, searches for himself and finally "awakens". Between 2025 and 2030, a world war that will affect all mankind has destroyed half of the population, and mankind can no longer control the direction of the war. In order to win the final victory, game-like unmanned battles have gradually intensified. It becomes: satellite laser, drone bombing, intelligent AI, unmanned multi-turret tank group battlefield... Then, there is also a group of girls who use guns that have fallen behind the times to fight-gun girls. Time goes back in time. The "intelligent cosmic life spirit body" that flew to the earth merged with the "inorganic matter" M4A1 in the warehouse of a nearby weapon merchant in order to avoid similar pursuits. During the tossing, "M4A1" fell into the hands of a military boy in a certain city. The girl took "M4A1" home, talked to her, cared for her, wiped her carefully, and the life forms in the universe began to move again. In response to the feelings of the youth, the gun (cosmic life form) autonomously transformed into a beautiful girl, and the gun that the youth turned into a human form was called "Kerry". However, knowing the major countries in which Kerry exists, Kerry's capture competition began, and the youth died in order to protect Kerry. Humans began to study "Gun Lady" Kerry. Barrett, Shasha and others are the research advancement products. Through the research of Kerry, human science and technology have made great progress and entered the space age. Betting on the hegemony of the universe, the outbreak of world wars in major countries, the "world war" officially unfolded. (translated from qq)

title: Dongfang Ke Er Zhi Modeng Xue Yuan
synopsis: In 2030, the living environment of people on earth has undergone tremendous changes. People travel in unmanned cars, use super-smart phones to connect, and freely shuttle with jetpacks. This is a slightly advanced future society. Each school has its own news television station. The high-tech studio in the school is similar to the TV news studio we are familiar with. The difference is that the news host, reporters and behind-the-scenes staff are all students.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Shi Shenhun
synopsis: The balance between the fairy world and the human world in the Chinese food world is broken by the mysterious different-dimensional force "famine eaters", and Chinese food is in a crisis of life and death. The former Chinese God of Food, Yi Yin, was demoted to the world for offending Tian Tiao, but happened to be possessed by the food idiot Yan Xiaolang. Since then, Yan Xiaolang has a huge food power. With Yi Yin's help, he set foot on saving Chinese food and became The road of learning to cook for the Chinese God of Food...  (translated from bilibili)

title: Shi Shenhun season2
synopsis: Yan Xiaolang, who was regarded as the "Master Yan" by the food eaters, became a fan of his life, and determined to become a real chef. With the help of the god of cook Yi Yin, he began to face the challenges of a series of advanced Chinese cuisine skills such as knife work and fire , Embark on the hard way of learning to cook! But the true evil forces have just awakened...  (translated from bilibili)

title: Yuansu Yingxiong Xiaobo Bo
synopsis: During the summer vacation, the boy Bobo went to the island where his grandfather lived on vacation, and met three new partners here. At the same time, the alien Adu Du came to the earth to find energy supply, and accidentally discovered that their home star had been extinct for 30,000 years, the super energy-cocoa beans, so he decided to snatch all the cocoa beans on the earth. The god of destiny handed over the mission of saving the earth to Xiaobobo by mistake. With the operation, he will deal with Adu Du with his friends... The protagonist BoboiBoy can be cloned into three people (with Nezha’s three heads and six arms) Different, not connected together), has the super powers of electricity, soil and wind; and his friend Yaya is a girl with flying super powers; chubby Gopal is a greedy kid who can turn everything into candy; Ying Is a cute little girl with scuds  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Taiji Xiongmao
synopsis: The Duke of Pader and Ann’s parents fought against the crown thief Mamun to protect the crown of the Holy Spirit. In order to completely defeat the mighty Mamun, Ann's parents chose to force him into the dark space, and Duke Pader was responsible for sealing the gate of time and space, and also sealing Ann. After hardships, An finally defeated his shadow and reached the realm of the unity of nature and man. In order to prevent Mamun, the son of darkness, from returning to the world, Ann launched a battle against Mamun, the god of darkness, with the help of his partners, to regain the crown of the Holy Spirit...  (traslated from bilibili)

title: Chao Neng Xiao Xing TAn
synopsis: Pangu City, as the intersection of alien civilization and earth civilization, hides many aliens. They pretend to be creatures on earth and live by our side. Among them are alien immigrants, alien tourists, and many villains with ulterior motives. And the one who hunts down these villains is the famous "Interstellar Detective".  (translated from bilibili)

title: Wudi Xiaolu
synopsis: The seasons change, and it's time for the deer to migrate. Some of the deer moved into the deep forest with dense vegetation, and some came to the prairie with rich water and grass... Our protagonist, the four deer, was deeply attracted by the wonderful and challenging human world and decided to move to the city to live. In order to adapt to urban life, the fawns try different jobs and participate in various activities; but they still retain many of the natural attributes of deer, such as their love for delicious plants, the use of antlers in many things, etc., staged a scene of funny, Lively, warm and cute story...  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Wudi Xiaolu season2
synopsis: The seasons change, and it's time for the deer to migrate. Some of the deer moved into the deep forest with dense vegetation, and some came to the prairie with rich water and grass... Our protagonist, the four deer, was deeply attracted by the wonderful and challenging human world and decided to move to the city to live. In order to adapt to urban life, the fawns try different jobs and participate in various activities; but they still retain many of the natural attributes of deer, such as their love for delicious plants, the use of antlers in many things, etc., staged a scene of funny, Lively, warm and cute story...  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Wudi Xiaolu season3
synopsis: The seasons change, and it's time for the deer to migrate. Some of the deer moved into the deep forest with dense vegetation, and some came to the prairie with rich water and grass... Our protagonist, the four deer, was deeply attracted by the wonderful and challenging human world and decided to move to the city to live. In order to adapt to urban life, the fawns try different jobs and participate in various activities; but they still retain many of the natural attributes of deer, such as their love for delicious plants, the use of antlers in many things, etc., staged a scene of funny, Lively, warm and cute story...  (transdlated from iqiyi)

title: Wudi Xiaolu Zhi Anquan Chengzhang
synopsis: Each episode has a story about child safety, so that children understand the potential dangers around them and learn to protect themselves. Babies are safer and parents are more at ease.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Wudi Xiaolu Gushi Pian
synopsis: "Invincible Little Deer Story" is based on the character's stupid, kind, and unwilling character to develop a plot around classic Chinese folk stories. The four little deer live in the fairy tale world. As they grow up day by day, the curious little deer encounter all kinds of troubles. They often visit the panda father living in the bamboo forest to find a solution to the trouble together. In the process They not only need to use each other’s wisdom, but also need to unite to play their respective abilities and perceive the power of cooperation. Sometimes the four fawns will collectively travel across the ancient world for adventure due to various chances. Not only do they make more new friends, they also experience the civilization, wisdom and infinite charm of history. "Invincible Little Deer Story" allows children to feel the charm of language while listening to stories and watching animations, and develop good personalities and learning habits in a sunny, healthy and pleasant atmosphere. At the same time, the play also stimulated the children's imagination. The folktales with moral education significance in the play let the children know and understand traditional virtues. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Wudi Lu Zhandui
synopsis: "Invincible Deer Team" is a 3D animated series aimed at children aged 3-7. The fawns live in the beautiful "Central Forest", which is their home and the place they guard. A technology city "Platinum City" has gradually developed around the forest, which is full of new technologies and new inventions, and all kinds of new things are subtly affecting and changing the lives of humans and animals. The four fawns have superpowers endowed by nature. They will use their wisdom and abilities to help animals and urban residents. Whenever a crisis or problem occurs, it is the moment for the Deer team to set off!  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Maoxian Xiao Wangzi
synopsis: The nine-year-old Bao Xiaolong often sees some strange things. In his eyes, the animals are all cute elves, but in the eyes of others, they are disgusting mice and cockroaches. Xiaolong's abnormality was not understood by his family, and he was rejected by his classmates and friends. One day, a pink meteor flew into Xiaolong's eyes, and he began to hear the voices of the elves. The elves kept emerging, exclaiming that Xiaolong was "that person", the elves of the golden dragon. Just as Xiaolong was puzzled, he received a letter from Yoda, the principal of the Siegway Wizard School. A lost trip to Hong Kong took Xiaolong to the magical Nayugu where he met Mercury Elf noodles. The human world is called Big Cube, and the place where elves and wizards live is Nayugu. Principal Yoda will invite the elves to come to Nayuguzigwei Elf School to learn how to be an elven when they are nine years old. The little dragon, who was excluded and not understood in the human world, felt unprecedented happiness and freedom in the magical Nayugori. Soon they made two good friends, Yu Mengmeng and Tang Nuo. After the three little friends experienced many adventures and peculiar events, not only the friendship deepened, the magic continued to improve, but also they learned that the legendary golden dragon was the first  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ji Gao Xia Yu Ali Baba
synopsis: The terrifying evil king and god rule the world, and people live in dire straits. The goddess of light, who was unbearable for the evil king's perversion, stepped forward and selected the righteous warriors • Jigaoxia and five heroes, and appointed them to crusade against the evil king. Jackie and the heroes used the sword sealed with mysterious power, the sword of the universe, and operated the mecha warriors to fight the evil king god.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Lu Jingling
synopsis: "Deer Elf" is a two-dimensional cartoon that combines fantasy, comedy, adventure and other elements. The protagonist of the film Deer is the offspring of the nine-color deer king. His parents are the deer king of the "wood" territory, and are loved by the gluttonous tribe. King Da was imprisoned for a long time and forced to provide him with King Deer energy. What's more troublesome is that King Da also sent a ferocious gluttonous warrior Wang Daming to capture Dier to eliminate potential threats against him. Young Dier is determined to accept the challenge and mission to rescue his parents and defend his home. He was accompanied and helped by envoys from the five territories. In the arduous journey through the five territories, Dill gained special power; after a series of trials and failures, with the help of friends and other elves, He obtained the energy of the five elements of gold, wood, water, fire and earth, and finally came to the golden (translated from bilibili)

title: Lu Jingling Zhi Xunzhao Bingmayong
synopsis: Based on the original background of the first season of "Deer Elf", the second season of the story "Deer Elf Searching for Terracotta Warriors" still starts from the harmonious continent of the five states. At this time Dier has become the new deer king in Lingmu Prefecture, but a bigger challenge is waiting for him and his friends. The biggest enemies Dill faced at this time were the dark warrior and the evil Queen Dar who broke the balance of nature. The Dark Samurai led Nanoworm and Queen Da to create the most powerful biomechanical dinosaur in the history of the earth, and wants to re-occupy the five continents! In order to defeat such a powerful enemy, Dill and his friends, with the help of the terracotta warrior boy Tao, once again embarked on an adventure tour of the Wuzhou Continent, looking for the legendary terracotta army. (translated from bilibili)

title: Tiantian Kuaile
synopsis: Tiantian lives in Garden City as a child in a family of three, a 5 and a half year old boy. Although he is still young, he is brave, witty, lively, naughty, and full of sense of justice. He is very curious, and he is an out-and-out smart guy. Mom and Dad are afraid of being alone every day because of their busy work, so they bought a little flying and talking pet to accompany Tiantian. The name is Kubao. There are many kindergarten friends every day, the kind and generous Yiyi, who always can't wake up, the bubble that keeps her hands on the pillow, and the dandy who always messes up. During the growing process of Tiantian and her friends, many stories happened at home, parks, kindergartens, shopping malls, and streets, and they also had many questions. Although it is some stories in daily life, through Tiantian, Yiyi and his  (translated from bilibili)

title: Tiantian Kuaile season2
synopsis: Tiantian lives in Garden City as a child in a family of three, a 5 and a half year old boy. Although he is still young, he is brave, witty, lively, naughty, and full of sense of justice. He is very curious, and he is an out-and-out smart guy. Mom and Dad are afraid of being alone every day because of their busy work, so they bought a little flying and talking pet to accompany Tiantian. The name is Kubao. There are many kindergarten friends every day, the kind and generous Yiyi, who always can't wake up, the bubble that keeps her hands on the pillow, and the dandy who always messes up. During the growing process of Tiantian and her friends, many stories happened at home, parks, kindergartens, shopping malls, and streets, and they also had many questions. Although it is some stories in daily life, through Tiantian, Yiyi and his  (translated from bilibili)

title: Tiantian Kuaile season3
synopsis: Tiantian lives in Garden City as a child in a family of three, a 5 and a half year old boy. Although he is still young, he is brave, witty, lively, naughty, and full of sense of justice. He is very curious, and he is an out-and-out smart guy. Mom and Dad are afraid of being alone every day because of their busy work, so they bought a little flying and talking pet to accompany Tiantian. The name is Kubao. There are many kindergarten friends every day, the kind and generous Yiyi, who always can't wake up, the bubble that keeps her hands on the pillow, and the dandy who always messes up. During the growing process of Tiantian and her friends, many stories happened at home, parks, kindergartens, shopping malls, and streets, and they also had many questions. Although it is some stories in daily life, through Tiantian, Yiyi and his (translated from bilibili)

title: Tiantian Kuaile 4
synopsis: The fourth series of "Happy Everyday" tells stories in daily life. Through the perspectives and experiences of Tiantian, Yiyi and their friends, they positively guide children to solve problems when they encounter problems in a complex and changeable world. The children actively face and deal with what happened. Set an example for small audiences, attract children's interest through rich content, and stimulate their unlimited potential. Through the perspective of children in this film, step by step implementation of each episode of an educational story, so that children can play, talk, sing, and dance Accept knowledge imperceptibly.  (translated from qq)

title: Kaixin senlin
synopsis: "Happy Forest" is a no dialogue animation. There are 50 episodes in this issue. The main characters in the story are lion, zebra, elephant, and rabbit. The four characters have huge differences in appearance and personality. The relationship between them tends to be one. The four children in the family or the four members of the team live and grow together every day. Every day is happy and moving, and of course there are some small troubles, but friends help each other, encourage each other, face the test of life together, and the days with friends and company, life is always colorful  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Wo De Xiao Xiao Mei Hou Wang
synopsis: Little Monkey King is a little monkey from Huaguoshan. He came to the human world and wanted to learn scientific knowledge through living in the human world and let himself grow. Little Monkey King came to the lively temple fair. In order to avoid the puppies, he turned into a rag doll and jumped to a stall. He happened to be bought home by Dabao’s father as Dabao’s New Year gift. In this way, the little monkey king came to Dabao's house and lived with their whole family. Two children who love learning and adventurous became best friends. Thus, the Little Monkey King started a series of stories about learning knowledge and understanding the world with Dabao. This series of cartoons starts with the little things that happen in the children's daily life, and triggers some basic scientific knowledge about astronomy, geography, chemistry, literature, and society. By watching cartoons, let small audiences learn these knowledge vividly and interestingly, and entertaining and learning (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xuan Ji Yongzhe Zhi Xuan Ji Zhan Ka
synopsis: The story takes place in Fengtian City in the 21st century. It tells the protagonists An Xiaowu, Yuan Feifei, Bai Yu, Zhou Hao, Jin Hao, Chen Mo and others whose fighter card machines were activated by accidentally importing an R program, which became popular. National level battle hall competition. In the increasingly fierce battle hall clearance process, the ambitions of the villain BOSS Black Ares gradually surfaced. Through wisdom, teamwork, courage, and self-confidence, Xiao Wu and others overcome difficulties step by step and finally defeated the Black Ares and guarded them. Fight card world and everyone's dream.  (translated from bilibili)

title: Huanle Dou Dizhu
synopsis: The story of "Joy the Landlord" takes place in a modern metropolis. The landlord and the peasant, living in the same building, are not only a happy couple, but also close friends in life. In addition to their own character attributes, they are constantly trying new jobs and new environments. Through hilarious daily life, this national game IP is made more life-like, so that they can live by your side and live ordinary and interesting lives. The unlucky but enthusiastic landlord, coupled with the honesty and luck of the peasants, makes every crisis a breeze. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Man Chong Ji
synopsis: Many mysterious incidents occurred in the deserted stone garden, the main city of bees, and many zergs in the valley were ambushed by parasites. The four insects were ordered by the Queen Bee to form a secret reconnaissance team. They bravely rushed into the "ghost city", but their actions were seen through. The mantis warriors were controlled by nematodes and threw themselves into the river. The ant scouts also disappeared under the control of fungi and parasites. The captain pulls the armour to rescue them and joins forces with the ant queen to find out that the behind-the-scenes is the queen bee. Finally, the warriors of the insect kingdom launched a general attack on the insidious Queen Bee Bee... (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ai Mi Gulu
synopsis: "Amy & Gollum" is an original animated series of Zuobao Culture. It is mainly aimed at 3-5 year old preschoolers. It tells the story of the cute little girl Amy and her monster friend Gollum living and adventuring in the magic forest.  (translated from youku)

title: Ai Mi Gulu season2
synopsis: "Amy Guru" is a creative and original animated series of Zuobao, which is mainly aimed at preschool children aged 3-5. The story tells the life story of 5-year-old human girl Amy and her big friend Gulu, imagining and solving problems together in a magical forest. The views are fresh and interesting. It is an "encyclopedia of inspiration for solving problems" for children.  (translated from youku)

title: Caihong Xiong Zhi Jizhan Huanying Guai
synopsis: In the Emerald Bay at the end of the remote joyful jungle, there is a rainbow bear energy school in the deepest part, where cute, upright and kind rainbow bears live. In the days of studying in the "Rainbow Bear Energy School", the students constantly encountered mission challenges from Dr. Xiong and Professor Xiong, but the biggest enemy of the Rainbow Bear School, the "Phantom Monster", wanted to destroy the Rainbow Bear Energy School all the time. , The classmates battled wits with the phantom monster, turned the knowledge and skills learned into a weapon against the phantom monster, and finally guarded the Rainbow Bear Energy School.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xun Ling Da Maoxian
synopsis: "Spirit-seeking Adventure" tells the story of Dr. Lan, as a medical volunteer, taking his daughter Lan Xiner, son Lan Bing and our protagonist Mano to Bomi Island to do field research. On the road, there was a terrible tornado, which caused the helicopter to crash. After the crash landing, several people dispersed in the jungle. Only Manuo, Lan Xiner and Lan Bing were lucky enough to join together. While the children were worried about the whereabouts of Dr. Lan, the tribal girl Zhuo Ma unexpectedly met with them, and speculated that Dr. Lan was probably taken away by the Hama. The kind-hearted Zhuoma decided to lead a few new friends and find Dr. Lan. [1]  In the process of traversing the jungle, Mano inadvertently got a mysterious sword and a cute little animal. Several people were rescued by the young man Ding Kai who also possessed a mysterious sword when faced with dangerous mutant insects. Ding Kai also joined Mano's group to find his lost father. On the way to find relatives, Manuo and Ding Kai discovered the secrets of the soul-seeking sword and the spirit beast. In order to escort Lan Xiner and Lan Bing to the fortress of the Hama clan, they used the power of their swords to successfully defeat and conquer the mutant spirit beasts and awaken the sword spirit. Eventually I saw Tiger King Anyu, the subordinate of the black-handed beast trainer who had taken Dr. Lan and disrupted the jungle order. In the end, under the joint efforts of humans and sword spirits, the subordinates of the trainer were all repelled. The jungle in Sabah was also successfully rescued. But the whereabouts of the two fathers are still missing. Under the guidance of the sword spirit, several children need to travel to a new area, gain energy by conquering the spirit beast, defeat the destroyer animal trainer, and find the father of the two children. As a result, several people embarked on the adventure of seeking spirits.  (translated from baidu baike)

title: Kong Tian Zhandui
synopsis: It tells the story of the young air and sky team rising up against the invaders after the earth was invaded by alien evil forces. Mecha modeling, the game between justice and evil, outer space, gunfights, heroism, science fiction, fantasy...constructed the "five elements to overcome each other, energy wins", the correct values of justice must defeat evil, and incorporate many domestic and foreign animation works in recent years. Hot spots are produced and broadcasted in the form of unit dramas.  (translated from bilibili)

title: Du Du Zhen
synopsis: The story tells the story of Aka, a courier who came to Dudu Town from outside to work. He was just a stranger when he first arrived in Dudu Town, but he was suddenly involved in a theft case and was mistaken as a thief. As a result, it was staged. Farce. Fortunately, the cyclone appeared later to clarify the accident and resolve the misunderstanding. During this incident, Aka gradually got acquainted with every member of the town, and he also gained everyone's recognition with his diligence, enthusiasm and the city. After that, the whole town staged humorous, tense, or warm stories around Akka. While doing daily work as a courier, Akka would also take time to help Tietou solve the case and listen to Xiaomeng. Telling stories, accepting interviews with Jasmine, etc., gradually merged into the new big family of Dudu Town. The theme of this film is "love"-friendship between friends, love for home, the environment, love for each occupation, love for life, etc., with this theme of love and childlike stories Teach joy to give children a kind of emotional awareness and positive energy development. The overall style of the film is humorous and funny, and strives to enhance the appreciation of the film with vivid lines, unique character characters, and conflicting plots. At the same time, it subtly cultivates the small audience's awareness of various types of vehicles and traffic rules, and the environment protection (translated from iqiyi)

title: Shanhai Baobei
synopsis: Shenlong is the patron saint of the Eastern Continent. Under his leadership, the gods bless this country with smooth weather, peace and tranquility. He was also revered as the totem of this continent. However, with the passage of time, Shenlong gradually aged. Until one day, the gods suddenly discovered that the Shenlong was missing, and they were plunged into chaos because the Shenlong did not designate his next heir. The group of dragons cannot be headless. In order to continue to maintain the peace of this continent, the gods decided to send the nine sons of the dragon and the descendants of other gods, a total of 99 beasts, to the human world to experience. The last winner among the nine sons of Shenlong can replace Shenlong and become the next totem candidate.  (translated from bilibili)

title: Shanhai Baobei season2
synopsis: "Mountain Sea Baby" mainly tells the story of a total of 99 divine beasts, the descendants of Shenlong and other gods, who were dispatched to the human world for totem in order to run for the totem.  (translated from bilibili)

title: A Mao Gushi
synopsis: Ah Mao is a clever, naughty, and imaginative child. He has a group of little friends who are also only children-his "follower" Xiaopi, the quiet Lanlan, the greedy and show-off fat beans, the overbearing tank, and two little pets-beautiful, elegant, The arrogant little white cat Snowball and funny-looking but faithful, good-tempered puppy hairballs. He also has two toy partners-arrogant, nasty-minded weird gowns and playful, boastful but very sincere thorn balls to Amao. When there are no outsiders, these two toys will "survive" ", play with Amao.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ai You Hei Pi
synopsis: "Ayyoza" is an 8-year-old second-grade student in elementary school. He is a lively and mischievous but kind-hearted child. Although he often causes trouble for classmates and teachers because of mischief, he is very popular with his friends. "Black Skin" is a Boston Terrier with upright personality, smart, agile, loyal and confident, and a sense of justice. Black Skin and Ouch are very good friends. Together, they fight Bond who dreams of making a fortune all day. Doctor. This is an animated world that gathers joy, wit, magic, fun and moving.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Mofa Keke
synopsis: Cocoa, the brave man thousands of years ago, traveled to the modern age. In the following story, Coco met the scientist Kiki, the adventurer Kaka, the gourmet steamed bun, the righteous Shida, and the blue-screened uncle who all know everything... the story in Coco Town In, there will be magical magic, funny robots, talking plant elves and so on. The story maintains an optimistic and positive rhythm, a relaxed and humorous style, and fantasy mix and match elements as the seasoning agent of the story, combined into a rich and interesting story. Create extraordinary stories in ordinary life.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Mofa Keke Zhi Shenmi Jingling Dao
synopsis: A new crisis has emerged! The elven world goes wild! The story takes place in the town of Coco. The protagonist Coco and his friends live happily in this wonderful world full of rabbits. But one day, a group of elemental spirits who love to destroy suddenly appeared. They have all kinds of magical abilities. The town of Cocoa was turned upside down, and all this was because the magical energy of the elemental spirits got out of control! In order to stabilize the energy of the elves and protect the town of Coco, the magician coco teamed up with scientist Kiki, adventurer Kaka, gourmet bun, and justice envoy, to launch a series of interesting daily life to resolve the elf crisis. However, the rescue operation of Cocoa's party was not all smooth sailing... On the order of the demon king, the black rabbit Miro who came to snatch the spirit energy stone always made different troubles to stop Cocoa, which would even affect the elemental spirits. The elves became more manic... In order to smoothly resolve every commotion, Coco worked hard to (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 魔法可可之神秘精灵岛
